name: Fetch Marketing Preferences with valid Data (only home email populated)

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930019836000"

When I fetch the Customer Marketing Preferences for CIF Key <cifKey>:
| cifKey |
| 0100000930019836000 |

Then the following Marking Information data should be returned
| preferredContactDay | preferredContactDayUpdateDate | preferredContactTime | preferredContactTimeUpdateDate | mailMarketingPreferences | mailMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | phoneMarketingPreferences | phoneMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | emailMarketingPreferences | emailMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | preferredContactMethod | mailMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | phoneMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | emailMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | mailMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | phoneMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | emailMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | mailMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | phoneMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | emailMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy |
|  |  |  |  | OPT IN | 2013-10-17 | OPT OUT | 2013-10-17 | OPT OUT | 2013-10-17 |  | null | null | null |  |  |  | 38309 | 38309 | 38309 |

children.description: Validate response: | preferredContactDay | preferredContactDayUpdateDate | preferredContactTime | preferredContactTimeUpdateDate | mailMarketingPreferences | mailMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | phoneMarketingPreferences | phoneMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | emailMarketingPreferences | emailMarketingPreferencesUpdateDate | preferredContactMethod | mailMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | phoneMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | emailMarketingPreferencesConfirmDate | mailMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | phoneMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | emailMarketingPreferencesConfirmBy | mailMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | phoneMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | emailMarketingPreferencesUpdateBy | | | | | | OPT IN | 2013-10-17 | OPT OUT | 2013-10-17 | OPT OUT | 2013-10-17 | | null | null | null | | | | 38309 | 38309 | 38309 |
